section:
The path wends its way between steep earthern banks from which the roots of trees protrude like ossified snakes. It brings you to a squat crypt built of green-veined grey marble. Above the entrance rises a small pyramid with a stone eye carved into the summit. In the centre of the eye sparkles an emerald as large as a duck’s egg.
Climb up to get the emerald Enter the crypt Retrace your steps and take the other path Leave the forest
